name: Diffusion Digital
description:
Diffusion Digital is a boutique Shopify and WordPress web production agency, who specialise in beautifully crafted brand design for web and print. 
Our team of Shopify and Wordpress experts have considerable experience creating customised sites. We can redesign your current website, or build it from the ground up, giving you a completely customised design that will propel your brand to the forefront of your industry.  
 
Additionally, we will set up your site with industry best practice SEO installed throughout. Our dedicated Search division will provide the highest level of ethical white hat SEO. We approach Search in a very rounded manner focusing on all aspects that have an impact on a website’s search visibility. This ranges from technical, onsite, offsite, through to social media and email marketing.
